Title: Data Scientist - Generative AI Specialist
Description:
DATA SCIENTIST â€“ GENERATIVE AI SPECIALIST

Entra nel nostro mondo.

Trasforma insieme a noi.

Quale sarÃ  la tua sfida?

Bip ha creato allâ€™interno del proprio Competence Centre â€œxTechâ€ il piÃ¹ nutrito gruppo di Data Scientist in Italia (fonte: statistiche LinkedIn), e dallâ€™Italia coordina anche i propri gruppi di Data Scientist locali presso le proprie sedi estere.

Nellâ€™ambito della continua crescita ed evoluzione di questo effervescente gruppo, che opera sui nostri clienti in tutti i settori, e ci ha consentito di introdurre lâ€™Intelligenza Artificiale presso le realtÃ  enterprise piÃ¹ importanti dâ€™Italia, siamo alla ricerca sia di profili junior/intermediate (dai neolaureati a profili con almeno 2 anni di esperienza), sia profili middle-senior (dai 3 ai 6 anni di esperienza). La provenienza da societÃ  di consulenza direzionale o informatica sarÃ  considerata un forte plus.

Il/La Generative AI Specialist in Bip evolve non solo le proprie competenze nei modelli di Generative AI, ma anche la comprensione dei fenomeni legati al Business dei nostri Clienti e le proprie capacitÃ  di tradurli in soluzioni e poi di comunicare e utilizzare i risultati degli stessi per migliorare ed efficientare i processi.

I/Le nostri/e Generative AI Specialists verranno introdotti in contesti progettuali dove per la maggior parte i dati sono non strutturati (testi, immagini, video, suoni) e il cui focus diventa la comprensione, il processamento e la generazione partendo da tali basi documentali altrimenti non processabili con le classiche tecniche di Data Science.

I contesti progettuali spaziano dallâ€™utilizzo di modelli pre-addestrati (es. LLM) fino allâ€™addestramento di nuovi modelli di Generative AI passando dal fine-tuning e absorption learning da modelli commerciali.

Oltre alle progettualitÃ , ai/alle Generative AI Specialist sarÃ  richiesto un contributo attivo per alimentare la Community con attivitÃ  di ricerca, scouting, concept di nuove soluzioni e business development.

Sarai tu ad entrare nel nostro team?

Requisiti indispensabili:


Laurea Specialistica in Ingegneria Informatica, Ingegneria Matematica, Informatica, Statistica o discipline affini (STEM);
Forte approccio quantitativo e brillanti doti analitiche;
Passione e competenza in ambito data exploration, analisi dati e creazione di modelli: il nostro team disegna e sviluppa sistemi a supporto di decisioni strategiche per il business;
Competenze statistiche, di Data Mining, Machine Learning,Â Deep Learning;
Solida conoscenza e comprovata esperienza in programmazione e scripting Python
Esperienza con strumenti di version control (es.Â Git);
Conoscenza approfondita di database relazionali e di costrutti SQL e SQL Programming;
Conoscenza di database non relazionali (es.Â elasticsearch,Â mongodb,Â redis);
Conoscenza di database vettoriali (es. ChromaDB, QDrant, Pinecone, ...)
Conoscenza e lâ€™utilizzo di API Cloud di Intelligenza Artificiale di almeno uno tra i principali cloud provider (Google, Microsoft, AWS)
Conoscenza tecniche di processamentoÂ dati non strutturati;
Conoscenza approfondita diÂ Natural Language Processing (NLP),Â Computer VisionÂ e relative tecniche (Text Categorization, Entity Extraction, Generation, Object Detection, Object Segmentation)
Esperienza su Reti Neurali,Â Convolutional Neural Network,Â Transformers;
Conoscenza di tecniche di Generative AI e dei principaliÂ Large Language ModelsÂ (LLM)
Esperienza con tecniche di allenamento e fine-tuning di reti neurali (esempio: superconvergenza, PEFT, LORA, â€¦)
Conoscenza delle principali librerie di processamento dati non strutturati (tensorflow,Â torch,Â pytorch) e repository di modelli (huggingface)
Conoscenza delle principali tecniche di prompting (es. one/few-shot, chain-of-thought)
Indispensabile la conoscenza fluente di italiano e inglese professionali


Plus:


Conoscenza di strumenti di containerizzazione (Docker, Kubernetes, etc)
Esperienza nello sviluppo e applicazione di modelli di Generative AI in contesti industriali
Esperienza nello sviluppo software e conoscenza approfondita del ciclo di vita del software
Conoscenza di framework di versionamento di dati e/o modelliÂ (es., Â MLFlow, DVC)
Utilizzo di reti generative per la produzione controllata di contenuto (testo, immagini, video)
Sviluppo di Motori di Ricerca, Entity Extraction, Anomaly Detection su immagini
Conoscenza principali modelli di Explainable AI (SHAP, Lime, Anchors)
Esperienza con framework di lavoro AGILE (esempio: Scrum, Kanban).


Soft Skills:


Standing consulenziale
Ottime doti relazionali e comunicative
Orientamento al cliente e al raggiungimento degli obiettivi
Buona attitudine a lavorare in team
Precisione e stress tolerance nel rispetto delle scadenze


PerchÃ¨ Bip?

People atÂ theÂ center of our culture

Fiducia e collaborazione, imprenditorialitÃ  e coraggio, meritocrazia e sviluppo guidano la crescita delle nostre persone.

Lavorare in BIP Ã¨ un'esperienza sfidante, in cui il merito paga e l'innovazione avviene attraverso idee coraggiose, collaborazione e un rapporto di fiducia con i nostri clienti.Â 

Challenge yourself

Avrai la possibilitÃ  di metterti alla prova in contesti progettuali diversi in termini di ambito, natura delle attivitÃ  e stakeholders coinvolti. Vedrai valorizzato il tuo spirito di iniziativa, la tua passione, lâ€™autonomia e la capacitÃ  di assumerti responsabilitÃ  e metterti in gioco.

Unlocking your potential

Potrai partecipare a + di 300 corsi formativi allâ€™avanguardia per accrescere le tue competenze su tecnologie e temi di business emergenti.

Work-life Integration

Troverai una policy che supporta lo smartworkingÂ fino al 100% del proprio tempo e favorisce il work-life integration.

Diversity, Equity & Inclusion

Valorizziamo lâ€™unicitÃ  e ci impegniamo a garantire che tutti abbiano pari opportunitÃ  di dare un contributo ed esprimere al massimo il potenziale nell'ambiente di lavoro.

Il nostro approccio alla diversitÃ  e allâ€™inclusione si fonda sui principi di etica e integritÃ  e rappresenta il fattore determinante per lo sviluppo di orizzonti, di crescita personale e aziendale, piÃ¹ ampi.

Promuoviamo lâ€™inserimento e lâ€™integrazione lavorativa delle persone appartenenti alle categorie protette â€“ in base a quanto disciplinato dalla legge 68/99 â€“.

Next Steps

Una volta ricevuto il tuo cv ci prendere
mo del tempo per valutarlo attentamente.

Se câ€™Ã¨ un match con questa o con altre posizioni aperte allâ€™interno del Gruppo, ti contatteremo per iniziare la nostra conoscenza reciproca.

Lâ€™iter di selezione comprende generalmente un colloquio con HR, un colloquio tecnico con un line manager ed un eventuale colloquio con un Partner.

Se dovessi identificare ulteriori posizioni di tuo interesse ed in linea con il tuo profilo, aspettiamo la tua candidatura per poterla valutare nuovamente.

Su di Noi

Nati nel 2003, abbiamo raccolto e valorizzato lâ€™esperienza storica della consulenza e abbiamo aggiunto due ingredienti chiave: lâ€™innovazione e la digitalizzazione.

Grazie a questo percorso siamo oggi oltre 5000 professionisti e professioniste, presenti in 13 Paesi, con oltre 4500 progetti alle spalle e le conoscenze piÃ¹ allâ€™avanguardia nell'ambito della Digital Transformation, Data Science, Cybersecurity, Industry 4.0, IOT e di tutte le Disruptive Technologies che mettiamo a servizio di ogni settore di mercato.

Aiutiamo i nostri clienti a fare la differenza creando qualitÃ  su larga scala attraverso una formula che opera su tre leve: Valore, Persone e Tecnologia.

Crediamo nel valore dellâ€™eccellenza, che Ã¨ la bussola su cui orientiamo il nostro agire, e adottiamo un approccio etico e leale nei confronti di quante e quanti scelgono diÂ lavorare con noi, promuovendo un ambiente in cui le persone possano crescere insieme, grazie alla contaminazione tra competenze diverse.

  • Conoscenza di database vettoriali (es. ChromaDB, QDrant, Pinecone, ...)
  • Conoscenza e lâ€™utilizzo di API Cloud di Intelligenza Artificiale di almeno uno tra i principali cloud provider (Google, Microsoft, AWS)
  • Conoscenza tecniche di processamento dati non strutturati;
  • Conoscenza approfondita di Natural Language Processing (NLP), Computer Vision e relative tecniche (Text Categorization, Entity Extraction, Generation, Object Detection, Object Segmentation)
  • Esperienza su Reti Neurali, Convolutional Neural Network, Transformers;
  • Conoscenza di tecniche di Generative AI e dei principali Large Language Models (LLM)
  • Esperienza con tecniche di allenamento e fine-tuning di reti neurali (esempio: superconvergenza, PEFT, LORA, â€¦)
  • Conoscenza delle principali librerie di processamento dati non strutturati (tensorflow, torch, pytorch) e repository di modelli (huggingface)
  • Conoscenza delle principali tecniche di prompting (es. one/few-shot, chain-of-thought)
  • Indispensabile la conoscenza fluente di italiano e inglese professionali


Plus:
  • Conoscenza di strumenti di containerizzazione (Docker, Kubernetes, etc)
  • Esperienza nello sviluppo e applicazione di modelli di Generative AI in contesti industriali
  • Esperienza nello sviluppo software e conoscenza approfondita del ciclo di vita del software
  • Conoscenza di framework di versionamento di dati e/o modelli (es.,  MLFlow, DVC)
  • Utilizzo di reti generative per la produzione controllata di contenuto (testo, immagini, video)
  • Sviluppo di Motori di Ricerca, Entity Extraction, Anomaly Detection su immagini
  • Conoscenza principali modelli di Explainable AI (SHAP, Lime, Anchors)
  • Esperienza con framework di lavoro AGILE (esempio: Scrum, Kanban).


Soft Skills:
  • Standing consulenziale
  • Ottime doti relazionali e comunicative
  • Orientamento al cliente e al raggiungimento degli obiettivi
  • Buona attitudine a lavorare in team
  • Precisione e stress tolerance nel rispetto delle scadenze


PerchÃ¨ Bip?

People at the center of our culture

Fiducia e collaborazione, imprenditorialitÃ  e coraggio, meritocrazia e sviluppo guidano la crescita delle nostre persone.

Lavorare in BIP Ã¨ un'esperienza sfidante, in cui il merito paga e l'innovazione avviene attraverso idee coraggiose, collaborazione e un rapporto di fiducia con i nostri clienti. 

Challenge yourself

Avrai la possibilitÃ  di metterti alla prova in contesti progettuali diversi in termini di ambito, natura delle attivitÃ  e stakeholders coinvolti. Vedrai valorizzato il tuo spirito di iniziativa, la tua passione, lâ€™autonomia e la capacitÃ  di assumerti responsabilitÃ  e metterti in gioco.

Unlocking your potential

Potrai partecipare a + di 300 corsi formativi allâ€™avanguardia per accrescere le tue competenze su tecnologie e temi di business emergenti.

Work-life Integration

Troverai una policy che supporta lo smartworking fino al 100% del proprio tempo e favorisce il work-life integration.

Diversity, Equity & Inclusion

Valorizziamo lâ€™unicitÃ  e ci impegniamo a garantire che tutti abbiano pari opportunitÃ  di dare un contributo ed esprimere al massimo il potenziale nell'ambiente di lavoro.

Il nostro approccio alla diversitÃ  e allâ€™inclusione si fonda sui principi di etica e integritÃ  e rappresenta il fattore determinante per lo sviluppo di orizzonti, di crescita personale e aziendale, piÃ¹ ampi.

Promuoviamo lâ€™inserimento e lâ€™integrazione lavorativa delle persone appartenenti alle categorie protette â€“ in base a quanto disciplinato dalla legge 68/99 â€“.

Next Steps

Una volta ricevuto il tuo cv ci prendere
mo del tempo per valutarlo attentamente.

Se câ€™Ã¨ un match con questa o con altre posizioni aperte allâ€™interno del Gruppo, ti contatteremo per iniziare la nostra conoscenza reciproca.

Lâ€™iter di selezione comprende generalmente un colloquio con HR, un colloquio tecnico con un line manager ed un eventuale colloquio con un Partner.

Lâ€™ordine e il numero delle interviste potrebbero variare a seconda delle esigenze di recruiting.

In alternativa, saremo felici di conservare il tuo CV nel nostro database per poterlo rivalutare per altre opportunitÃ  future.

Se dovessi identificare ulteriori posizioni di tuo interesse ed in linea con il tuo profilo, aspettiamo la tua candidatura per poterla valutare nuovamente.

Su di Noi

Nati nel 2003, abbiamo raccolto e valorizzato lâ€™esperienza storica della consulenza e abbiamo aggiunto due ingredienti chiave: lâ€™innovazione e la digitalizzazione.

Grazie a questo percorso siamo oggi oltre 5000 professionisti e professioniste, presenti in 13 Paesi, con oltre 4500 progetti alle spalle e le conoscenze piÃ¹ allâ€™avanguardia nell'ambito della Digital Transformation, Data Science, Cybersecurity, Industry 4.0, IOT e di tutte le Disruptive Technologies che mettiamo a servizio di ogni settore di mercato.

Aiutiamo i nostri clienti a fare la differenza creando qualitÃ  su larga scala attraverso una formula che opera su tre leve: Valore, Persone e Tecnologia.

Crediamo nel valore dellâ€™eccellenza, che Ã¨ la bussola su cui orientiamo il nostro agire, e adottiamo un approccio etico e leale nei confronti di quante e quanti scelgono di lavorare con noi, promuovendo un ambiente in cui le persone possano crescere insieme, grazie alla contaminazione tra competenze diverse.

Title: (Global Oil Gas) Senior Data Scientist
Description:
This role required candidate to permanently relocate at Dhahran, Saudi Arabia.

About the Company



This company engages in the exploration, production, transportation, and sale of crude oil and natural gas. It operates through the following segments: Upstream, Downstream, and Corporate. The Upstream segment includes crude oil, natural gas and natural gas liquids exploration, field development, and production. The Downstream segment focuses on refining, logistics, power generation, and the marketing of crude oil, petroleum and petrochemical products, and related services to international and domestic customers. The Corporate segment offers supporting services including human resources, finance, and information technology. The company was founded on May 29, 1933 and is headquartered in Dhahran, Saudi Arabia.

Job Summary

We are seeking a Data Scientist to join the Sales & Operations Planning Division's (S&OP) under the Global Optimizer Department. S&OP's primary responsibility is to optimize crude allocation and operations across global manufacturing facilities. This optimization aims to maximize revenue, increase profitability, and capitalize on international market opportunities.

The division serves as the gatekeeper for linear programming (LP) at wholly owned refineries and oversees the integrated global MPIMS model. This model is crucial for optimizing global crude allocation, exploring new international markets, and integrating operational options.

As a Data Scientist, your main role will involve analyzing and structuring large volumes of real-time and historical data. You will build algorithms and solutions around this data to facilitate decision-making within the company. Your work will be pivotal in supporting the company's forecasting and predictive digital strategy, contributing to the development of advanced solutions at the Downstream Digital Center.

Key Responsibilities:

Formulate and lead multifaceted analytic studies against large volumes of data.
Interpret and analyze data using exploratory mathematical and statistical techniques based on the scientific method.
Coordinate research and analytic activities utilizing various data points (unstructured and structured) and employ programming to clean, massage, and organize the data.
Experiment against data points, provide information based on experiment results, and offer previously undiscovered solutions to complex data challenges.
Lead all data experiments tasked by the Data Science Team.
Coordinate with Data Engineers to build data environments providing data identified by Data Analysts, Data Integrators, Knowledge Managers, and Intel Analysts.
Develop methodology and processes for prioritization and scheduling of projects.
Analyze problems and determine root causes.
Define company data assets (data models), Spark, SparkSQL, and HiveSQL jobs to populate data models.
Work closely with all business units and engineering teams to develop strategy for long-term data platform architecture.



Requirements:

Willingness to relocate to Dhahran, Saudi Arabia.
Hold a Bachelor's degree in Operations Research, Industrial Engineering, Applied Mathematics, Statistics, Physics, Computer Science, or related fields. An advanced degree is preferred.
Have 5-7 years of professional experience in a related field.
Proficiency with one or more programming languages (Java, C++, Python, R, etc.).
Demonstrate experience applying data science methods to real-world data problems.
Experience in utilizing visualization tools to leverage the growing volume of available information.
Show more

Title: Machine Learning Engineer
Description:
About Translated

Translated is a leading company in AI-enabled translation services. We are on a mission to allow everyone to understand and be understood in their own language.

Our success stems from a unique blend of the worldâ€™s #1 adaptive neural machine translation technology (IDC MarketScape 2022), the largest network of vetted, native-speaking professional translators, and top-ranked AI-enabled text, audio, and video translation tools (Gartner, 2022).

By leveraging a seamless symbiosis of artificial intelligence and human creativity, we design custom localization projects that were previously unthinkable, helping more than 280,000 clients grow their businesses worldwide.

Weâ€™re looking for a passionate Machine Learning Engineer to join the Translated Data Science and AI Production team in our HQ in Pi Campus, Rome. The persona will be responsible for building and maintaining the Machine Learning and AI services of the company.




Key responsabilities

Lead the development of Machine Learning services
Build and maintain CI/CD pipelines
Improve and maintain our GPU cluster
Improve and maintain our API ecosystem
Optimize and put in production Machine Learning models
Collaborate with other team members on internal and external models
Coding, debugging and testing
Build high-quality reusable code that can be used in the future.
Develop functional and sustainable applications with clean codes.
Collaborate with a multidisciplinary team of product owners, designers, developers and system administrators.
Collaborate with the ModernMT and Research teams to create the best Translation Engine ever




Requirements

Master degree in Computer Science or SW Engineering courses
3+ years of working experience
Proven experience in developing and maintaining scalable Machine Learning and AI services
Deep Knowledge of Python, Java and Bash
Experience with Kubernetes and Docker
Experience with Relational DBMS ( MySQL, PostgreSQL )
Experience with NoSQL DBMS ( Redis, MongoDB )
Experience with version control GIT and Github workflow
Proactive, self-driven and enjoys solving complex problems, not just in the primary area of responsibility but across boundaries




Headquarter

Translated is hosted at Pi Campus, a working environment immersed in nature where 7 luxury villas have been converted into functional offices to foster talent growth. Pi Campus is also a venture firm created by Translated to reinvest part of its profits into promising AI startups.




Benefits and Perks

Gym
Swimming Pool
Kickboxing, TRX, and Pilates classes
Table Tennis and Football table
Kitchen and snacks
Bonuses and incentives for employees who quit smoking, ride a bicycle to work, or adopt a child.

Learn more about our company: https://translated.com/work-at-translated-onboarding.




Diversity statement

At Translated, we proudly embrace and celebrate each individual's unique qualities to our team, regardless of race, sexual orientation, gender identity, or any other differences. We recognize that these diverse perspectives empower us to overcome challenges, foster innovation, and drive excellence. As an inclusive and equal-opportunity employer, we are committed to cultivating an environment where everyone feels welcome, valued, and supported to achieve their full potential.

  • Proactive, self-driven and enjoys solving complex problems, not just in the primary area of responsibility but across boundaries


Headquarter

Translated is hosted at Pi Campus, a working environment immersed in nature where 7 luxury villas have been converted into functional offices to foster talent growth. Pi Campus is also a venture firm created by Translated to reinvest part of its profits into promising AI startups.


Benefits and Perks

  • Gym
  • Swimming Pool
  • Kickboxing, TRX, and Pilates classes
  • Table Tennis and Football table
  • Kitchen and snacks
  • Bonuses and incentives for employees who quit smoking, ride a bicycle to work, or adopt a child.

Learn more about our company: https://translated.com/work-at-translated-onboarding.


Diversity statement

At Translated, we proudly embrace and celebrate each individual's unique qualities to our team, regardless of race, sexual orientation, gender identity, or any other differences. We recognize that these diverse perspectives empower us to overcome challenges, foster innovation, and drive excellence. As an inclusive and equal-opportunity employer, we are committed to cultivating an environment where everyone feels welcome, valued, and supported to achieve their full potential.

Title: Bioinformatics Scientist
Description:
If you are interested in professional challenges, this is your opportunity! Do not hesitate to apply for this offer!




JUNO Genetics is looking for a a motivated and skilled individual with experience in computational data analysis to join our cross-functional team at Juno Genetics Italy (This position is based in Rome). As a Bioinformatics Scientist reporting to the Bioinformatics R&D Manager, you will bring your expertise in genomics technologies and data science to advance knowledge and enhance outcomes in embryonic research, reproductive genetics, diagnosis, and education. Your main mission will be to creatively identify, implement and apply computational methods for the analysis of clinical and genomic datasets. You will build automated pipelines, apply machine learning methods, and discuss strategies and results with a team of Embryologists, Genetic experts and other Bioinformaticians.




MAIN DUTIES AND RESPONSIBILITIES:

Develop programmatic tools and workflows that enable the analysis of complex genomics and clinical datasets (e.g., GWAS, big exome/genome sequencing datasets from biobanks and from internal resources). Build data analysis pipelines in a clear and reproducible manner.
Collaboratively propose ideas and solutions to the scientific challenges that Juno Genetics is looking to solve and discuss results and alternatives with the team.
Investigate new scientific capabilities that emerge from published literature in the field of Bioinformatics and Data Science and work to prototype and implement those that could be relevant to Juno Genetics research and data types.
Collaborate in the preparation of scientific reports and journal articles and occasionally present papers, posters, and collaborate with projects at partner institutions.
Represent Juno Genetics at external meetings/seminars, either with other members of the group or alone.




POSITION REQUIREMENTS:

Academic training in Bioinformatics, Statistics, Computational Biology, Bioengineering, Biology, Computer sciences, Physics or similar.
Proficient in -omics data analysis.
Familiarity with genetics concepts and with descriptive and inferential statistics.
Advanced programmer in Python or R.
Familiarity with Bash scripting and with software packages for biomedical and statistical data analysis.
Effective communication skills and ability to present outcomes within multi-disciplinary forums.
Proficient in Italian and English.




SKILLS AND QUALIFICATIONS MOST VALUED:

PhD, or equivalent academical / industrial experience in bioinformatics, statistical genetics, or other computational subject with application to biology.
Hands on experience analysing WES, WGS, or GWAS.
Previous work experience on pipeline execution platforms (HPC schedulers, cloud providers) and software tools (Git, Docker, Conda).




We offer you the possibility of joining a team of recognised prestige and an organisation where human capital is very important and where you will have the opportunity to develop professionally.




Juno Genetics is committed to Diversity, Inclusion, Equal Treatment and Opportunities, especially with Sustainable Development Goal 5 (SDG), Gender Equality, and the fight against discrimination in any form. Therefore, this offer is addressed to any person who meets the requirements, regardless of their status.

Title: Graph Data Scientist (Rif. 2024-05)
Description:
Join our Cybersecurity Team as a Graph Data Scientist!




At aizoOn, we have been pioneering cybersecurity solutions since 2007 and developing cutting-edge technology since 2012. Our flagship product, introduced in 2013, was among the first in the world to apply machine learning techniques to network traffic analysis, detecting behavioral anomalies and advanced attacks.




Our mission: Revolutionizing Cybersecurity

We are on a mission to transform cybersecurity challenges with a data driven approach. Our goal is to become a global vendor, with a disruptive platform to reshape the cybersecurity landscape. Traditional practices driven by risks hypothesis based on annual interviews and on-paper assessments are outdated. With our ESRA platform (Enhanced Security Risk Analytics), we provide near real-time visibility across the cyber realm and data-driven risk analysis, offering a revolutionary approach to objective cybersecurity risk management.




Why Join Us?

Innovative Environment: Be part of a dynamic team of over 30 experts with deep and diverse expertise, pushing the boundaries of cybersecurity.
Startup Spirit: We value entrepreneurial drive, innovative thinking, and the grit to challenge the status quo.
Passion for Technology: If you are passionate about technology and improving society, this is the place for you.
Comprehensive Benefits: Competitive salary, performance-based bonuses, welfare incentives and stock options.




Your Role

As a Graph Data Scientist, you will be crucial in developing, evolving and maintaining our innovative cybersecurity solution, ESRA. Your contribution will directly impact the safety and security of our digital world.

You will be responsible for:

Proposing new approaches to analyze and solve problems
Designing advanced algorithms on graphs modeling networks and medium/large environments (from thousands to hundreds of thousands of nodes)
Implementing proof-of-concept algorithms designed to validate their effectiveness and performance
Research activities for continuous improvement and innovation of the product




What Weâ€™re Looking For

Education: Degree in technical-scientific disciplines (Plus: Ph.D. with topics related to graph analytics and algorithms).
Experience: at least 3 years of previous experience with algorithms and graph analytics (preferred on Big Data).
Language Skills: Proficiency in the English language.




Technical Skills

Graph Drawing
Proficiency in tools for managing large graphs
Ability to design and implement algorithms and analytics, even on large graphs
Good programming skills in high-level languages
Plus: Experience in programming languages such as Python and Java
Cybersecurity: Previous experience cybersecurity context will be considered a plus




Apply Now!

Join us in reshaping the cybersecurity landscape. Send your application and become a part of our innovation journey.

Entrare a far parte di BNL Gruppo BNP Paribas significa lavorare in una delle principali banche italiane, parte di un Gruppo internazionale leader europeo nei servizi bancari e finanziari, presente in piÃ¹ di 64 paesi con circa 184 mila collaboratori. Significa quindi lavorare in un ambiente sfidante, con una cultura internazionale e fortemente orientato allâ€™innovazione.

Cosa fa la struttura di Digital Channel -Design & Development

La missione della tribe Ã¨ di gestire lâ€™evoluzione e la manutenzione dei Canali Digitali della Banca, le applicazioni di CRM e realizzare in modo industriale le capabilities Digitali a supporto dei diversi Customer Journey dei clienti.

Cosa farai concretamente?

Parteciperai attivamente alle attivitÃ  di Quality & Maintenance della Tribe che ha lâ€™obiettivo di :

  • Garantire il run delle applicazioni
  • Migliorare la qualitÃ  degli asset e dei relativi servizi offerti ai clienti
  • Assicurare un allineamento per la gestione delle attivitÃ  di IT Production e Security

In particolare dovrai effettuare supporto di secondo livello, interagendo e guidando i team di supporto, gestendo in maniera efficace i ticket di manutenzione entro gli SLA definiti ed applicando la classificazione dei ticket di manutenzione per indirizzare azioni di miglioramento continuo dei processi automatizzati

Dovrai analizzare i problemi applicativi in produzione ed analizzare le esigenze aziendali per evolvere le applicazioni e i processi esistenti; progettare e sviluppare nuove applicazioni o parti di esse quando richiesto, nonchÃ© collaborare all'analisi di nuove soluzioni tecnologiche

Il/la candidato/a ideale:


Â· Ha spiccate capacitÃ  di problem solving

Â· Lavora bene in gruppo in ottica collaborativa ed Ã¨ dotato di buona capacitÃ  comunicativa

Â· Eâ€™ abile nella gestione delle anomalie coinvolgendo e coordinando attivamente i diversi interlocutori necessari allâ€™analisi dei ticket e alla risoluzione dei problemi.

Â· Ãˆ abile nella capacitÃ  di sintesi e semplificazione

Â· Organizza le attivitÃ  per prioritÃ  e gestisce con facilitÃ  gli imprevisti


Il/la candidato/a ideale conosce:

Â· Java

Â· Angular

Â· Oracle,

Â· IBM Data Stage

Â· Lingua Inglese (livello B2)

  • Junit

  • DEVOPS: jenkins, maven, nexus, sonarQube
  • Conoscenza di architetture cloud, microservizi, container etc.
  • Conoscenza di architetture web, applicazioni client/server, servizi API
  • Processi Devops e continuous integration;
  • GIT e il processo GitFlow;


Il background del/la candidato/a ideale:

Â· Ha conseguito una laurea nelle discipline STEM o cultura equivalente;

Â· Il Full-Stack Developer ha almeno tre/cinque anni di esperienza di analisi e sviluppo, con tre anni di esperienza in attivitÃ  di progettazione e sviluppo su applicazioni Web, DB e tecnologia client/server, API.

Â· Conosce le principali architetture IT Enterprise e i principi fondamentali

Â· Conosce e/o ha lavorato con metodologia Agile

La nostra offerta:

Il contratto previsto Ã¨ a tempo indeterminato, la retribuzione segue quanto previsto dal Contratto Collettivo Nazionale del Credito ed Ã¨ commisurata al livello di esperienza maturata.


Sede di lavoro

Roma

In un mondo che cambia, la diversitÃ  e l'inclusione sono valori fondamentali. BNP Paribas offre pari opportunitÃ  di lavoro a tutti i candidati idonei e si impegna attivamente a garantire un ambiente di lavoro inclusivo in cui tutte le diversitÃ  siano valorizzate. Il presente annuncio si rivolge a candidati di ambo i sessi (D.Lgs. 198/2006, Codice Pari OpportunitÃ )

Title: Software Engineer
Description:
Our strategy: We're developing a unified backend for processing satellite imagery, enabling applications in climate change detection, disaster management, and environmental monitoring. We continuously enhance our platformâ€”comprising our expertise, technologies, data, and company cultureâ€”to tackle increasingly complex challenges in the EO field.

For a talented, driven, and collaborative engineer, joining our team offers rapid learning, significant impact, and accelerated career progression.

We're seeking exceptional software engineers to work on our EO data platform. You'll work directly on production code, improving our products and adding new features. Our tech stack primarily includes Python, GCP and various geospatial technologies, but we adapt our tools to meet evolving needs.

A Few Examples Of Your Responsibilities


Collaborate with other engineers to expand our libraries and optimize processes.
Explore cutting-edge technologies to enhance our productivity and capabilities.
Continuously improve our platform by fixing bugs and refactoring code.
Develop and maintain scalable backend services and APIs.


What We Look For


Reasoning ability: You solve complex problems, think from first principles, and pay attention to crucial details.
Drive: You're ambitious, take initiative, and hold yourself to high standards.
Team spirit: You support the best ideas, help your teammates, and communicate honestly.
Proficiency in English and strong coding skills, particularly in Python.


What We Offer


Talented, entrepreneurial teams working on high-impact projects.
Exceptional growth opportunities, with the chance to lead significant initiatives.
Comprehensive benefits, including flexible hours, remote work options, learning support, and more.


Before you apply: Our environment is demanding and fast-paced. We have ambitious goals and expect a lot from each team member. If you're excited by the challenge and ready to give your best, we encourage you to apply.

Applications are welcome in English and Italian.

We value diversity in backgrounds and experiences. If you're passionate about the role and believe you could excel in it, we encourage you to apply, even if you don't meet every qualification.

2-4 anni di esperienza in progetti nel settore industriale, preferibilmente in societÃ  di consulenza

Conoscenza avanzata di Python e delle librerie per manipolazione dati e sviluppo modelli (pandas, tensorflow, scikit-learn, pytorch, eccâ€¦)

Title: Senior AI Engineer
Description:
SENIOR AI ENGINEER

Entra nel nostro mondo.

Trasforma insieme a noi.

Quale sarÃ  la tua sfida?

Il nostro team di Artificial Intelligence Engineering si impegna a supportare i clienti nel percorso di adozione dellâ€™intelligenza artificiale attraverso la realizzazione di factory di soluzioni di AI, azionabili e integrate nell'architettura e nei processi aziendali.

La figura dellâ€™AI Engineer progetta soluzioni software di Machine Learning (ML) scalabili per i casi d'uso dei clienti e le industrializza per lâ€™esecuzione in produzione garantendo i livelli richiesti di performance, sicurezza e governabilitÃ .

Lâ€™AI Engineer lavora a stretto contatto con altre figure di Bip xTech, come Cloud Data Architect, Data Scientist e Data Engineer, per realizzare soluzioni AI di alta qualitÃ  sotto ogni aspetto, disegnando e implementando: piattaforme MLOps, architetture dati e AI, modelli di AI, applicazioni e altro ancora.

Lâ€™AI Engineer inoltre contribuirÃ  alla Bip xTech Data Community con attivitÃ  di ricerca, scouting tecnologico, concept di nuove soluzioni e sviluppo del business sui clienti di BIP.

Sarai tu a entrare nel nostro team?Â 

Requisiti fondamentali


Laurea specialistica in Ingegneria Informatica, Data Science, Informatica o discipline affini (STEM).
Esperienza pregressa di almeno 5 anni nello sviluppo di software in almeno un linguaggio, come per esempio: Python, Scala, e/o simili.
Esperienza nel disegno di soluzioni software e nellâ€™implementazione di strutture dati, algoritmi.
Esperienza nellâ€™utilizzo degli strumenti di Code Repository e CI/CD.
Conoscenza di framework di versionamento di dati e/o modelli (esempio: MLFlow, DVC, WanDBâ€¦).
Conoscenza dei concetti, algoritmi e metodologie di Machine Learning e Gen AI.
Esperienza con linguaggi SQL per il design, query e gestione dei database; esperienza nellâ€™utilizzo di linguaggi SQL per le attivitÃ  di ETL;
Esperienza in attivitÃ  di coordinamento e crescita di un team o piÃ¹ team di progetto, pre-sales e delivery;
Indispensabile la conoscenza fluente di italiano e inglese professionali.


Plus


Esperienza nellâ€™utilizzo delle principali piattaforme cloud (esempio: Google, AWS, Azure) e relativi servizi di Cloud Foundation, Data Platform e AI.
Esperienza con tecniche di allenamento e fine-tuning di reti neurali (esempio: superconvergenza, PEFT, LORAâ€¦).
Conoscenza di tecniche di semi-supervised e self-supervised learning.
Esperienza con framework di lavoro AGILE (esempio: Scrum, Kanban).


Soft Skills:


Standing consulenziale
Spiccate doti comunicative e interpersonali
CapacitÃ  di collaborazione in team
FlessibilitÃ  e stress tolerance nel rispetto delle scadenze
DisponibilitÃ  di trasferte in Italia o allâ€™estero


PerchÃ¨ Bip?

People atÂ theÂ center of our culture

Fiducia e collaborazione, imprenditorialitÃ  e coraggio, meritocrazia e sviluppo guidano la crescita delle nostre persone.

Lavorare in BIP Ã¨ un'esperienza sfidante, in cui il merito paga e l'innovazione avviene attraverso idee coraggiose, collaborazione e un rapporto di fiducia con i nostri clienti.Â 

Challenge yourself

Avrai la possibilitÃ  di metterti alla prova in contesti progettuali diversi in termini di ambito, natura delle attivitÃ  e stakeholders coinvolti. Vedrai valorizzato il tuo spirito di iniziativa, la tua passione, lâ€™autonomia e la capacitÃ  di assumerti responsabilitÃ  e metterti in gioco.

Unlocking your potential

Potrai partecipare a + di 300 corsi formativi allâ€™avanguardia per accrescere le tue competenze su tecnologie e temi di business emergenti.

Work-life Integration

Troverai una policy che supporta lo smartworkingÂ fino al 100% del proprio tempo e favorisce il work-life integration.

Title: Software Developer Junior (Gruppo Enav)
HTML:
• Azienda del Gruppo ENAV|SocietÃ  responsabile gestione e manutenzione hardware/software dei sistemi ATM


About Our Client

Techno Sky Ã¨ la societÃ  del Gruppo ENAV responsabile della gestione e della manutenzione hardware/software di impianti e sistemi utilizzati per l'erogazione dei servizi di assistenza al volo. Insieme alla controllata IDS AirNav sviluppa software complessi volti a supportare le operazioni di analisi e controllo del traffico, secondo gli standard internazionali. In qualitÃ  di integratore dei sistemi mission critical di ENAV, presidia l'intera catena del valore: ricerca e sviluppo, ingegneria dei sistemi, progettazione, sviluppo del software, sviluppo dei sistemi meteo, installazione, integrazione e manutenzione degli strumenti di misura, gestione delle parti di ricambio e riparazione. Assicura la gestione tecnico/operativa di 4 Centri di Controllo d'area, 45 aeroporti, 44 sistemi radar, 121 centri di telecomunicazione, 68 sistemi Meteo e 239 sistemi di aiuto alla navigazione aerea.

Job Description

Cosa farai

Entrerai a far parte della struttura Engineering, presso una delle nostre sedi del territorio romano e supporterai la progettazione e lo sviluppo software nell'ambito dei progetti e della manutenzione correttiva ed evolutiva del software ATM e meteo, con particolare focus sulle seguenti attivitÃ :

  • Analisi dei requisiti di sistema e progettazione dell'architettura software;
  • Sviluppo software e test unitari;
  • Bug fixing dei sistemi software.


The Successful Applicant

Requisiti

La risorsa che cerchiamo ha le seguenti caratteristiche:

  • Laurea, almeno Triennale, in discipline STEM;
  • Conoscenza delle fasi di analisi e di progettazione (capacitÃ  di definire requisiti di sistema e di identificarne le componenti software opportune);
  • Conoscenza dei principali Architectural Patterns e di UML per la definizione di architetture di sistema;
  • Conoscenza di Design Pattern nell'ambito della progettazione e sviluppo del software;
  • Conoscenza dei linguaggi di programmazione Java;
  • Conoscenza dei principali sistemi di versionamento del software (GIT, SVN) e dei principali tool e sistemi per la build automation (Ant, Maven, Jenkins);
  • Conoscenza della lingua inglese al livello B2 o superiore (Riferimento: CEFR);
  • Conoscenza della lingua italiana al livello C1 o superiore (Riferimento: CEFR).

Ulteriori skill: a) esperienza nel campo del Software Engineering svolta per programmi del dominio difesa-spazio-trasporto; b) conoscenza della tool chain IBM (Doors, Rhapsody, etc); c) conoscenza di Eclipse; d) conoscenza/esperienza delle metodologie MDE (Model Driven Engineering) o MBSE (Model Based System Engineering).

What's On Offer

I nostri Valori

ENAV Group promuove la diversitÃ  in tutte le sue forme, valorizza l'unicitÃ  di ogni persona e si impegna ogni giorno a costruire un ambiente di lavoro sostenibile. Talento, competenza e diversitÃ  sono i valori in cui crediamo, consapevoli che il capitale umano Ã¨ il nostro asset piÃ¹ importante.

Raccontaci le esperienze di valore che hai maturato, siamo pronti ad offrirti formazione per lo sviluppo delle tue competenze.

Contact: Gianluca Iacobelli

Quote job ref: JN-072024-6484757

Title: (Global Oil Gas) Senior Data Scientist
Description:
This role required candidate to permanently relocate at Dhahran, Saudi Arabia.

About the Company



This company engages in the exploration, production, transportation, and sale of crude oil and natural gas. It operates through the following segments: Upstream, Downstream, and Corporate. The Upstream segment includes crude oil, natural gas and natural gas liquids exploration, field development, and production. The Downstream segment focuses on refining, logistics, power generation, and the marketing of crude oil, petroleum and petrochemical products, and related services to international and domestic customers. The Corporate segment offers supporting services including human resources, finance, and information technology. The company was founded on May 29, 1933 and is headquartered in Dhahran, Saudi Arabia.

Job Summary

We are seeking a Data Scientist to join the Sales & Operations Planning Division's (S&OP) under the Global Optimizer Department. S&OP's primary responsibility is to optimize crude allocation and operations across global manufacturing facilities. This optimization aims to maximize revenue, increase profitability, and capitalize on international market opportunities.

The division serves as the gatekeeper for linear programming (LP) at wholly owned refineries and oversees the integrated global MPIMS model. This model is crucial for optimizing global crude allocation, exploring new international markets, and integrating operational options.

As a Data Scientist, your main role will involve analyzing and structuring large volumes of real-time and historical data. You will build algorithms and solutions around this data to facilitate decision-making within the company. Your work will be pivotal in supporting the company's forecasting and predictive digital strategy, contributing to the development of advanced solutions at the Downstream Digital Center.

Key Responsibilities:

Formulate and lead multifaceted analytic studies against large volumes of data.
Interpret and analyze data using exploratory mathematical and statistical techniques based on the scientific method.
Coordinate research and analytic activities utilizing various data points (unstructured and structured) and employ programming to clean, massage, and organize the data.
Experiment against data points, provide information based on experiment results, and offer previously undiscovered solutions to complex data challenges.
Lead all data experiments tasked by the Data Science Team.
Coordinate with Data Engineers to build data environments providing data identified by Data Analysts, Data Integrators, Knowledge Managers, and Intel Analysts.
Develop methodology and processes for prioritization and scheduling of projects.
Analyze problems and determine root causes.
Define company data assets (data models), Spark, SparkSQL, and HiveSQL jobs to populate data models.
Work closely with all business units and engineering teams to develop strategy for long-term data platform architecture.



Requirements:

Willingness to relocate to Dhahran, Saudi Arabia.
Hold a Bachelor's degree in Operations Research, Industrial Engineering, Applied Mathematics, Statistics, Physics, Computer Science, or related fields. An advanced degree is preferred.
Have 5-7 years of professional experience in a related field.
Proficiency with one or more programming languages (Java, C++, Python, R, etc.).
Demonstrate experience applying data science methods to real-world data problems.
Experience in utilizing visualization tools to leverage the growing volume of available information.
Show more
HTML:
This role required candidate to permanently relocate at Dhahran, Saudi Arabia.

About the Company



This company engages in the exploration, production, transportation, and sale of crude oil and natural gas. It operates through the following segments: Upstream, Downstream, and Corporate. The Upstream segment includes crude oil, natural gas and natural gas liquids exploration, field development, and production. The Downstream segment focuses on refining, logistics, power generation, and the marketing of crude oil, petroleum and petrochemical products, and related services to international and domestic customers. The Corporate segment offers supporting services including human resources, finance, and information technology. The company was founded on May 29, 1933 and is headquartered in Dhahran, Saudi Arabia.

Job Summary

We are seeking a Data Scientist to join the Sales & Operations Planning Division's (S&OP) under the Global Optimizer Department. S&OP's primary responsibility is to optimize crude allocation and operations across global manufacturing facilities. This optimization aims to maximize revenue, increase profitability, and capitalize on international market opportunities.

The division serves as the gatekeeper for linear programming (LP) at wholly owned refineries and oversees the integrated global MPIMS model. This model is crucial for optimizing global crude allocation, exploring new international markets, and integrating operational options.

As a Data Scientist, your main role will involve analyzing and structuring large volumes of real-time and historical data. You will build algorithms and solutions around this data to facilitate decision-making within the company. Your work will be pivotal in supporting the company's forecasting and predictive digital strategy, contributing to the development of advanced solutions at the Downstream Digital Center.

Key Responsibilities:

  • Formulate and lead multifaceted analytic studies against large volumes of data.
  • Interpret and analyze data using exploratory mathematical and statistical techniques based on the scientific method.
  • Coordinate research and analytic activities utilizing various data points (unstructured and structured) and employ programming to clean, massage, and organize the data.
  • Experiment against data points, provide information based on experiment results, and offer previously undiscovered solutions to complex data challenges.
  • Lead all data experiments tasked by the Data Science Team.
  • Coordinate with Data Engineers to build data environments providing data identified by Data Analysts, Data Integrators, Knowledge Managers, and Intel Analysts.
  • Develop methodology and processes for prioritization and scheduling of projects.
  • Analyze problems and determine root causes.
  • Define company data assets (data models), Spark, SparkSQL, and HiveSQL jobs to populate data models.
  • Work closely with all business units and engineering teams to develop strategy for long-term data platform architecture.

Requirements:

  • Willingness to relocate to Dhahran, Saudi Arabia.
  • Hold a Bachelor's degree in Operations Research, Industrial Engineering, Applied Mathematics, Statistics, Physics, Computer Science, or related fields. An advanced degree is preferred.
  • Have 5-7 years of professional experience in a related field.
  • Proficiency with one or more programming languages (Java, C++, Python, R, etc.).
  • Demonstrate experience applying data science methods to real-world data problems.
  • Experience in utilizing visualization tools to leverage the growing volume of available information.

Title: Machine Learning Engineer
Description:
About Translated

Translated is a leading company in AI-enabled translation services. We are on a mission to allow everyone to understand and be understood in their own language.

Our success stems from a unique blend of the worldâ€™s #1 adaptive neural machine translation technology (IDC MarketScape 2022), the largest network of vetted, native-speaking professional translators, and top-ranked AI-enabled text, audio, and video translation tools (Gartner, 2022).

By leveraging a seamless symbiosis of artificial intelligence and human creativity, we design custom localization projects that were previously unthinkable, helping more than 280,000 clients grow their businesses worldwide.

Weâ€™re looking for a passionate Machine Learning Engineer to join the Translated Data Science and AI Production team in our HQ in Pi Campus, Rome. The persona will be responsible for building and maintaining the Machine Learning and AI services of the company.




Key responsabilities

Lead the development of Machine Learning services
Build and maintain CI/CD pipelines
Improve and maintain our GPU cluster
Improve and maintain our API ecosystem
Optimize and put in production Machine Learning models
Collaborate with other team members on internal and external models
Coding, debugging and testing
Build high-quality reusable code that can be used in the future.
Develop functional and sustainable applications with clean codes.
Collaborate with a multidisciplinary team of product owners, designers, developers and system administrators.
Collaborate with the ModernMT and Research teams to create the best Translation Engine ever




Requirements

Master degree in Computer Science or SW Engineering courses
3+ years of working experience
Proven experience in developing and maintaining scalable Machine Learning and AI services
Deep Knowledge of Python, Java and Bash
Experience with Kubernetes and Docker
Experience with Relational DBMS ( MySQL, PostgreSQL )
Experience with NoSQL DBMS ( Redis, MongoDB )
Experience with version control GIT and Github workflow
Proactive, self-driven and enjoys solving complex problems, not just in the primary area of responsibility but across boundaries




Headquarter

Translated is hosted at Pi Campus, a working environment immersed in nature where 7 luxury villas have been converted into functional offices to foster talent growth. Pi Campus is also a venture firm created by Translated to reinvest part of its profits into promising AI startups.




Benefits and Perks

Gym
Swimming Pool
Kickboxing, TRX, and Pilates classes
Table Tennis and Football table
Kitchen and snacks
Bonuses and incentives for employees who quit smoking, ride a bicycle to work, or adopt a child.

Learn more about our company: https://translated.com/work-at-translated-onboarding.




Diversity statement

At Translated, we proudly embrace and celebrate each individual's unique qualities to our team, regardless of race, sexual orientation, gender identity, or any other differences. We recognize that these diverse perspectives empower us to overcome challenges, foster innovation, and drive excellence. As an inclusive and equal-opportunity employer, we are committed to cultivating an environment where everyone feels welcome, valued, and supported to achieve their full potential.

Title: Bioinformatics Scientist
Description:
If you are interested in professional challenges, this is your opportunity! Do not hesitate to apply for this offer!




JUNO Genetics is looking for a a motivated and skilled individual with experience in computational data analysis to join our cross-functional team at Juno Genetics Italy (This position is based in Rome). As a Bioinformatics Scientist reporting to the Bioinformatics R&D Manager, you will bring your expertise in genomics technologies and data science to advance knowledge and enhance outcomes in embryonic research, reproductive genetics, diagnosis, and education. Your main mission will be to creatively identify, implement and apply computational methods for the analysis of clinical and genomic datasets. You will build automated pipelines, apply machine learning methods, and discuss strategies and results with a team of Embryologists, Genetic experts and other Bioinformaticians.




MAIN DUTIES AND RESPONSIBILITIES:

Develop programmatic tools and workflows that enable the analysis of complex genomics and clinical datasets (e.g., GWAS, big exome/genome sequencing datasets from biobanks and from internal resources). Build data analysis pipelines in a clear and reproducible manner.
Collaboratively propose ideas and solutions to the scientific challenges that Juno Genetics is looking to solve and discuss results and alternatives with the team.
Investigate new scientific capabilities that emerge from published literature in the field of Bioinformatics and Data Science and work to prototype and implement those that could be relevant to Juno Genetics research and data types.
Collaborate in the preparation of scientific reports and journal articles and occasionally present papers, posters, and collaborate with projects at partner institutions.
Represent Juno Genetics at external meetings/seminars, either with other members of the group or alone.




POSITION REQUIREMENTS:

Academic training in Bioinformatics, Statistics, Computational Biology, Bioengineering, Biology, Computer sciences, Physics or similar.
Proficient in -omics data analysis.
Familiarity with genetics concepts and with descriptive and inferential statistics.
Advanced programmer in Python or R.
Familiarity with Bash scripting and with software packages for biomedical and statistical data analysis.
Effective communication skills and ability to present outcomes within multi-disciplinary forums.
Proficient in Italian and English.




SKILLS AND QUALIFICATIONS MOST VALUED:

PhD, or equivalent academical / industrial experience in bioinformatics, statistical genetics, or other computational subject with application to biology.
Hands on experience analysing WES, WGS, or GWAS.
Previous work experience on pipeline execution platforms (HPC schedulers, cloud providers) and software tools (Git, Docker, Conda).




We offer you the possibility of joining a team of recognised prestige and an organisation where human capital is very important and where you will have the opportunity to develop professionally.




Juno Genetics is committed to Diversity, Inclusion, Equal Treatment and Opportunities, especially with Sustainable Development Goal 5 (SDG), Gender Equality, and the fight against discrimination in any form. Therefore, this offer is addressed to any person who meets the requirements, regardless of their status.

Title: AI/ML and MLOps Field Engineer
Description:
Canonical is a leading provider of open source software and operating systems to the global enterprise and technology markets. Our platform, Ubuntu, is very widely used in breakthrough enterprise initiatives such as public cloud, data science, AI, engineering innovation and IoT. Our customers include the world's leading public cloud and silicon providers, and industry leaders in many sectors. The company is a pioneer of global distributed collaboration, with 1000+ colleagues in 70+ countries and very few roles based in offices. Teams meet two to four times yearly in person, in interesting locations around the world, to align on strategy and execution.

The company is founder led, profitable and growing.

We are hiring an AI/ML and MLOps Field Engineer to help global companies embrace AI in their business, using the latest open source capabilities on public and private cloud infrastructure, Linux and Kubernetes. Our team applies expert insights to real-world customer problems, enabling the enterprise adoption of Ubuntu, Kubeflow, MLFlow, Feast, DVC and related analytics, machine learning and data technologies. We are working to create the world's best open source data platform, covering traditional SQL databases and today's NoSQL data stores, as well as the machinery which turns data into insights and executable models.

The people who love this role are software engineers who enjoy customer conversations and solving customer problems during the presales cycle. They are are developers who like to solve customer problems through architecture, presentations and training. Ubuntu is used by pretty much every enterprise in the world, in every industry. This is a fantastic opportunity to learn about the open source technology landscape and develop your business technology insights. You will see first hand in various industries how Linux - and Ubuntu in particular - is shaping innovation and changing the world for the better.

This role is particularly suited to candidates with a technical background who are business minded and driven by commercial success. This role is on our global Field Engineering team and will work closely with enterprise sales leads. We are specifically looking for people interested in solving the most difficult problems in modern data architectures. Training LLMs on multiple K8s clusters deployed on a hybrid cloud infrastructure with GPU sharing across multiple teams? Processing 10M events in real time for financial transactions? Object detection on 10k parallel 4K video streams? These are the problems we solve day to day.

Location: Most of our colleagues work from home. We are growing teams in EMEA, Americas and APAC time zones, so can accommodate candidates from almost any country.

What your day will look like

The global Field Engineering team members are Linux and cloud solutions architects for our customers, designing private and public cloud solutions fitting their workload needs. They are the cloud consultants who work hands-on with the technologies by deploying, testing and handing over the solution to our support or managed services team at the end of a project. They are also software engineers who use Python to develop Kubernetes operators and Linux open source infrastructure-as-code.


Work across the entire Linux stack, from kernel, networking, storage, to applications
Architect cloud infrastructure solutions like Kubernetes, Kubeflow, OpenStack, and Spark
Deliver solutions either on-premise or in public cloud (AWS, Azure, Google Cloud)
Collect customer business requirements and advise them on Ubuntu and relevant open source applications
Grow a healthy, collaborative engineering culture in line with the company values
Deliver presentations and demonstrations of Ubuntu Pro and AI/ML capabilities to prospective and current clients
Liaise with product teams to give them feedback on requirements to influence roadmap
Work collaboratively with your sales team to reach our common targets
Global travel up to 25% of time for internal and external events and 25% to customer meetings


What we are looking for in you


Exceptional academic track record from both high school and university
Undergraduate degree in a technical subject or a compelling narrative about your alternative chosen path
Experience in data engineering, MLOps, or big data solutions deployment
Experience with a relevant programming language, like Python, R, or Rust.
Confidence to respectfully speak up, exchange feedback, and share ideas without hesitation
Track record of going above-and-beyond expectations to achieve outstanding results
Demonstrated personal interest in continuous learning and development
Practical knowledge of Linux, virtualisation, containers and networking
Business-minded technology thinker and problem solver
Knowledge of cloud computing concepts & leaders, such as Kubernetes, AWS, Azure, GCP
Interest in large-scale enterprise open source - private clouds, machine learning and AI, data and analytics
Intermediate level Python programming skills
Passion for technology evidenced by personal projects and initiatives
The work ethic and confidence to shine alongside motivated colleagues
Professional written and spoken English with excellent presentation skills
Experience with Linux (Debian or Ubuntu preferred)
Excellent interpersonal skills, curiosity, flexibility, and accountability
A dynamic person who loves to jump in new projects and interact with people
Appreciative of diversity, polite and effective in a multi-cultural, multi-national organisation
Thoughtfulness and self-motivation
Result-oriented, with a personal drive to follow up and meet commitments
Ability to travel internationally, for company events up to two weeks long, and customer or industry meetings


What you'll learn


Architect and deploy AI/ML infrastructures, data processing pipelines and multi-cluster distributed training
Wide range of open source applications and skills
Work directly with customers in a range of different businesses
Real-life and hands-on exposure to a wide range of emerging technologies and tools


What we offer colleagues

We consider geographical location, experience, and performance in shaping compensation worldwide. We revisit compensation annually (and more often for graduates and associates) to ensure we recognise outstanding performance. In addition to base pay, we offer a performance-driven annual bonus or commission. We provide all team members with additional benefits, which reflect our values and ideals. We balance our programs to meet local needs and ensure fairness globally.


Distributed work environment with twice-yearly team sprints in person
Personal learning and development budget of USD 2,000 per year
Annual compensation review
Recognition rewards
Annual holiday leave
Maternity and paternity leave
Employee Assistance Programme
Opportunity to travel to new locations to meet colleagues
Priority Pass, and travel upgrades for long haul company events


About Canonical

Canonical is a pioneering tech firm at the forefront of the global move to open source. As the company that publishes Ubuntu, one of the most important open source projects and the platform for AI, IoT and the cloud, we are changing the world of software. We recruit on a global basis and set a very high standard for people joining the company. We expect excellence - in order to succeed, we need to be the best at what we do. Most colleagues at Canonical have worked from home since its inception in 2004. Working here is a step into the future, and will challenge you to think differently, work smarter, learn new skills, and raise your game.

Canonical is an equal opportunity employer

We are proud to foster a workplace free from discrimination. Diversity of experience, perspectives, and background create a better work environment and better products. Whatever your identity, we will give your application fair consideration.

Title: Graph Data Scientist (Rif. 2024-05)
Description:
Join our Cybersecurity Team as a Graph Data Scientist!




At aizoOn, we have been pioneering cybersecurity solutions since 2007 and developing cutting-edge technology since 2012. Our flagship product, introduced in 2013, was among the first in the world to apply machine learning techniques to network traffic analysis, detecting behavioral anomalies and advanced attacks.




Our mission: Revolutionizing Cybersecurity

We are on a mission to transform cybersecurity challenges with a data driven approach. Our goal is to become a global vendor, with a disruptive platform to reshape the cybersecurity landscape. Traditional practices driven by risks hypothesis based on annual interviews and on-paper assessments are outdated. With our ESRA platform (Enhanced Security Risk Analytics), we provide near real-time visibility across the cyber realm and data-driven risk analysis, offering a revolutionary approach to objective cybersecurity risk management.




Why Join Us?

Innovative Environment: Be part of a dynamic team of over 30 experts with deep and diverse expertise, pushing the boundaries of cybersecurity.
Startup Spirit: We value entrepreneurial drive, innovative thinking, and the grit to challenge the status quo.
Passion for Technology: If you are passionate about technology and improving society, this is the place for you.
Comprehensive Benefits: Competitive salary, performance-based bonuses, welfare incentives and stock options.




Your Role

As a Graph Data Scientist, you will be crucial in developing, evolving and maintaining our innovative cybersecurity solution, ESRA. Your contribution will directly impact the safety and security of our digital world.

You will be responsible for:

Proposing new approaches to analyze and solve problems
Designing advanced algorithms on graphs modeling networks and medium/large environments (from thousands to hundreds of thousands of nodes)
Implementing proof-of-concept algorithms designed to validate their effectiveness and performance
Research activities for continuous improvement and innovation of the product




What Weâ€™re Looking For

Education: Degree in technical-scientific disciplines (Plus: Ph.D. with topics related to graph analytics and algorithms).
Experience: at least 3 years of previous experience with algorithms and graph analytics (preferred on Big Data).
Language Skills: Proficiency in the English language.




Technical Skills

Graph Drawing
Proficiency in tools for managing large graphs
Ability to design and implement algorithms and analytics, even on large graphs
Good programming skills in high-level languages
Plus: Experience in programming languages such as Python and Java
Cybersecurity: Previous experience cybersecurity context will be considered a plus




Apply Now!

Join us in reshaping the cybersecurity landscape. Send your application and become a part of our innovation journey.
